content: remaining kfb k1 bn kfb k to 2 sts remaining kfb k1 4 sts increased © 2019 yarn twisters 2 swirl socks sts remain l2t k1 bn k slip 1 purlwise p to 2 sts beyond the marker round 3 tn *k2 l2t* repeat * to * until end of p2tog p1 turn pull the yarn tight marker can row bn k be removed as this point round 4 tn k3 *l2t k2* repeat * to * until 1 sts remain k1 bn k *slip 1 purlwise k to 1 st before the gap ssk the st before the gap and the st after the gap size 2 k1 turn round 1 tn *l2t k2* repeat * to * until 2 sts remain l2t bn k slip 1 purlwise p to 1 st before the gap p2tog round 2 tn k1 *l2t k2* repeat * to * until 1 st the st before the gap and the st after the gap remain k1 bn k p1 turn* round 3 tn *k2 l2t* repeat * to * until 2 sts remain k2 bn k repeat * to * until 2 sts remaining after the round 4 tn k3 *l2t k2* repeat * to * until 3 gaps on both the k and the p side sts remain l2t k1 bn k slip 1 purlwise k to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 repeat these 4 rnds until the work reaches the you will now be at the end of the bn and will point where the leg connects for the foot begin to knit in the round again approx 5 5 6 6 5 begin increasing for the gusset tn maintain 4 round repeat bn k1 k2tog k to 2 sts remaining ssk gusset increases tn maintain 4 round repeat bn k2tog k to end while maintaining the 4 round repeat for the tn heel is now complete st count is back to 56 follow the instructions for the bn 60 64 sts 28 30 32 sts per needle round 1 tn maintain 4 round repeat bn kfb k to leg 2 sts remaining kfb k1 round 2 tn maintain 4 round repeat bn k continue with 4 round pattern on tn and bn until leg measures approx 4 5 for all sizes repeat these 2 rnds until you have increased ending on round 4 to 54 58 62 sts on the bn cuff knit 1 more round on tn maintaining the 4 round repeat be sure to note which round of the round 1 k1 p1 pattern you completed so you can resume the repeat round 1 until cuff measures 2 pattern repeat once the heel has been turned loosely bobble all sts in pattern turn the heel sample was bobble using jeny s surprisingly you will be working back and forth on the bn stretchy bind off only the stitches on the tn will not be worked http //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php until you have completed the heel decreases
